cmp: 台 (surname/(classical) you (in letters)/platform/Taiwan (abbr.), desk/platform, (measure word)/platform/stage/terrace/stand/support/desk/station/broadcasting station, typhoon)
mng: fetus, litter, tire, abbr. of 輪胎|轮胎

exm.mng: to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist, to turn over a new leaf, fig. to change wholly, to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
to induce an abortion, induced abortion
prenatal education, antenatal training, prenatal influences
to become pregnant, to carry a child in the womb
to re-enter the womb (of departed spirit), reincarnation
